sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Input, List, Card, Pagination, Drawer, Form, Button, Col, Row, Space, Select, message } from 'antd'; import { PlusOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import LinkButton from '../../components/LinkButton'; const { Option } = Select export default class Order extends Component { myForm = React.createRef() // 清空表单 onReset = () => { this.myForm.current.resetFields() } render() { const columns = [ { title: '车次', dataIndex: 'trainsNumber', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '出发日期', dataIndex: 'startDate', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '起点站', dataIndex: 'startStation', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '终点站', key: '4', dataIndex: 'endStation', align: 'center', }, { title: '达到时间', key: '5', dataIndex: 'endDate', align: 'center', }, { title: '乘客姓名', key: '6', dataIndex: 'name', align: 'center', }, { title: '乘客身份证', key: '7', dataIndex: 'idCard', align: 'center', }, { title: '座位类别', key: '8', dataIndex: 'seatType', align: 'center', }, { title: '座位号', key: '9', dataIndex: 'seatNumber', align: 'center', }, { title: '下单时时间', key: '10', dataIndex: 'orderTime', align: 'center', }, { title: '支付状态', key: '11', dataIndex: 'payState', align: 'center', }, ]; const dataSource = [ { key: '1', trainsNumber: 'G2154', startDate: '2021.01.01', startStation: '成都', endStation: '北京', name: '张三', idCard: '5108212121212', seatNumber: 'A12', orderTime: '2121.01.01', payState: '已支付', }, ] return (
车票管理} >
( 成都 )} />
) } }
